title: Local Po
desc: A SaaS web application designed to streamline the job hiring process by connecting job seekers with employers efficiently. This platform simplifies recruitment, ensuring a seamless experience for both candidates and employers.
features: Job seekers can browse and apply for available job listings.
Employers have access to a dashboard with tables for managing applicants.
Staging system for tracking the hiring process

title: RJ Avancena POS
desc: A comprehensive Inventory Management System and Point of Sale (POS) solution designed to streamline business operations. It offers powerful tools for managing sales, inventory, and users efficiently.
features: Provides a sales overview, transaction history, and top-selling products for data-driven decision-making.
Menu - point of sale, Allows users to select items, process purchases, and manage transactions seamlessly.
Inventory management, stores and tracks all products to ensure efficient stock control.
Users management, enables role-based access control for different users.

title: Frogman Merchant
desc: Lightweight e-commerce platform designed for small to medium-sized businesses. It provides a seamless online shopping experience for customers while giving merchants full control over their store management.
features: Merchants can add, update, and manage inventory with ease.
Customers can browse, add items to cart, and checkout smoothly.
Merchants promotional codes and discounts to boost sales.
Gaming and atthe sametime selling merch.

title: Basic Clothing E-Commerce
desc: Stylish e-commerce platform designed specifically for clothing and fashion brands. It offers a seamless shopping experience with a sleek, minimalist design that highlights the latest trends in apparel.
features: Modern UI/UX Design, Clean and intuitive interface for effortless browsing.
Product Catalog, Organized sections for clothing categories, including men’s, women’s, and accessories.
Responsive & Mobile-Friendly, Optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile shopping.

title: Drumpad App
desc: DrumPad App is an interactive music-making application designed for beatmakers, producers, and music enthusiasts. It provides an intuitive drum pad interface that allows users to create rhythms.
features: Responsive Drum Pads – Play and trigger high-quality sound samples with keyboard tap.
User-Friendly Interface, Simple, sleek UI designed for both beginners and professionals.
Color tap effects, use Neon Colors like electric blue, purple, and cyan for a futuristic feel.
